dublin_core.dcvalue: The huge amount of released medical apps prevents medical app users from believing that medical scientific societies and other accreditation bodies as well have the resources and the power for assigning to any medical app a quality score By the time being any medical app user has to take the risks related to the frequently insufficient accreditation of that app Providing clear user oriented schemas to be adopted both when putting a medical App on the market and when an App comes to be evaluated by a cohort or single users becomes crucial The aim of our research was to define a pictorial identification one shot schema for a comprehensive user oriented identification of medical apps
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-06T19:01:55Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2014-05-15
A pictorial schema for a comprehensive user-oriented identification of medical Apps.
